#**Coursera Getting and Cleaning Data Assignment - Assignment**

##**Submited Files**

* run_analysis.R
* README.md
* CodeBook.md

##**Instructions**


1.	Checkout the code 

2.	Download the data set, https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip.

3.	Unzip the data set into your local directory 

4.	Load RStudio and set your working directory 

5.	Load the R script using source("run_analysis.R")

6.	Run the R script using run_analysis() and after execution output files would be available in working directory

##**Output Files**

* merged_tidy_select_data.txt
* summarized_tidy_select_data.txt
